name: The Alchemist Cookbook
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Young outcast Sean has isolated himself in a trailer in the woods, setting out on alchemic pursuits, with his cat Kaspar as his sole companion. Filled with disdain for authority, he’s fled the daily grind and holed up in the wilderness, escaping a society that has no place for him. But when he turns from chemistry to black magic to crack nature’s secret, things go awry and he awakens something far more sinister and dangerous.
about_the_game: Young outcast Sean has isolated himself in a trailer in the woods, setting out on alchemic pursuits, with his cat Kaspar as his sole companion. Filled with disdain for authority, he’s fled the daily grind and holed up in the wilderness, escaping a society that has no place for him. But when he turns from chemistry to black magic to crack nature’s secret, things go awry and he awakens something far more sinister and dangerous.
short_description: Young outcast Sean has isolated himself in a trailer in the woods with his cat Kaspar. When he turns from chemistry to black magic to crack nature’s secret, things go awry and he awakens something far more sinister and dangerous.
reviews:
“If you only see two American indie features co-starring Satan this year, one should obviously be THE WITCH. The other almost certainly will turn out to be THE ALCHEMIST COOKBOOK”
Variety

“A lean and mean curio”
Village Voice

“Hickson’s largely silent performance is superb (in the kind of complex role not typically given to black actors in modern horror movies), never overselling his creeping madness”
Brooklyn Magazine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7
  • Processeur : Un processeur Intel Core 2 ou l'équivalent d'AMD
  • Mémoire vive : 1 GB de mémoire
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 200 MB d'espace disque disponible
  • Notes supplémentaires : Bande-passante de 5Mbps pour 540p, 3Mbps pour 360p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 10
  • Processeur : Un processeur Intel Core I3+ ou l'équivalent d'AMD est recommandé pour une lecture en HD 1080p
  • Mémoire vive : 2 GB de mémoire
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 500 MB d'espace disque disponible
  • Notes supplémentaires : Bande-passante de 12Mbps pour 1080p ou 8Mbps pour 720p
